generic approach.from sentence: In this paper , we propose a generic approach to learn context - sensitive convolutional filters for natural language understanding .

novel bidirectional filter generation me.from sentence: In this regard , we propose a novel bidirectional filter generation mechanism to allow interactions between sentence pairs while constructing context - sensitive representations .

convolution operation.from sentence: In contrast to traditional CNNs , the convolution operation in our framework does not have a fixed set of filters , and thus provides the network with stronger modeling flexibility and capacity .

learned filters.from sentence: In this manner , the learned filters vary from sentence to sentence and allow for more fine - grained feature abstraction .

introduce.from sentence: Specifically , we introduce a meta network to generate a set of contextsensitive filters , conditioned on specific input sentences ; these filters are adaptively applied to either the same ( Section 3.2 ) or different ( Section 3.3 ) text sequences .
